title: Pixel Script
content:
Hey,

I’m after some pixel script type, I’ve found a couple like [FIG Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215636/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/fig-script/) and [Gardenia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215636/http:/www.pixilate.com/fonts/pixel/gardenia.htm) but wondered if you had any other recommendations?

Thanks!

 [‹ Spacing method](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215636/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15794 "Go to previous forum topic") [Logotype & graphical profile, need protip ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215636/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45174 "Go to next forum topic")
author: deplorableword

comments.content: I’m not sure if this is exactly what you’re after, but [Digital Kauno](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215636/http:/www.dafont.com/digital-kauno.font) is similar to the ones you have already found.

I was looking for something pretty pixelised but that’s really nice. Thanks!

Anyone else got any more?

I love superscript found here [www.superlooper.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215636/http:/www.superlooper.de/ "www.superlooper.de"). Horrible site. When you get to the fonts section, superscript is the third from the top.

Sharon

Thanks for the tip Sharon, your right about the site. Totally over designed.

Pixie Script looks really nice as well, Thanks!
